services.title: Our services
services.description: Our interior design agency offers personalized and innovative design solutions, transforming spaces into stylish, functional, and inspiring environments tailored to each client's unique vision and needs.

items.title: Concept Design
items.description: Includes a floor plan with proposed furniture layout and realistic 3D visualizations. This service provides a clear spatial concept and aesthetic vision tailored to your needs—ideal for understanding the potential of your space before moving into execution.

items.title: Concept Design + Technical Documentation
items.description: Includes everything in the Concept Design package, plus a complete set of technical drawings required for project execution. This package ensures your project is ready for implementation, with precise details for contractors and manufacturers.

items.title: Full Project Coordination
items.description: Includes Concept Design, Technical Documentation, and complete organization along with supervision of construction work. From the first idea to the final result, we manage the entire process—coordinating all contractors and ensuring the project is executed according to plan and quality standards.

items.title: Architectural Consultation
items.description: Duration: 60 minutes. An in-depth consultation with the architect to discuss your space, needs, and ideas. Whether you're just starting or refining an existing concept, this session helps define the direction of your project.

projectFlow.title: Project Flow
projectFlow.description: Our Project Flow ensures a seamless and efficient interior design experience, encompassing:

steps.title: First meeting
steps.description: Getting to know the client, his needs, wishes, aesthetic aspirations, coordinating the timeline of the potential project.

steps.title: Plan delivery
steps.description: Presenting the floor plan and discussing it, presenting the mood board and aesthetics in which direction the project would go

steps.title: First 3D input
steps.description: Correction of the conclusions from the last meeting and the first 3d input (draft visualisation)

steps.title: Delivery of realistic visualisations
steps.description: Realistic visualisations show how the space could look with respect to the client's guidelines, discussions about the client's opinion

steps.title: Final visualisation and presentation
steps.description: Changes according to the client's input and finalisation of the 3D appearance

steps.title: Technical drawings
steps.description: Delivery of technical drawings and detailed preparation with craftsmen for the creation of the project

steps.title: Project realization and supervision
steps.description: The best result is certainly when the architect supervises the work of the craftsman and controls the delivered quality
